title: Bannable if done consistently right?
body:
Normal game.  Nobody called jungle. Cool.

Pick a jungler. Have smite. Nobody called it.  Lock in as its Fucking obvious.

10s left, nunu autolocks jungle, gets in game trolls. and says he can't get banned because he "called it". 

Says Riot doesn't care if he "double jungles" though he left bot stranded and put me behind

TIL calling a role after its already been picked with 10s left guarantees you that spot
